mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(u_phone, u_nick, u_integral, device_id, channel_id, source, u_crtuser, u_crtdate) VALUES (#{uPhone}, #{uNick}, #{uIntegral}, #{deviceId}, #{channelId}, #{source}, '系统', now())
mapper.update: update user set u_qrcode = #{uQrcode}, token = #{token} where u_id = #{uId}
update user set device_id = #{deviceid}, channel_id = #{channelid} where u_phone = #{phone}
update user set u_headicon = #{uHeadicon} where u_id = #{uId}
update user set u_mmd_no = #{params.mmd_name}, u_mmd_password = #{params.mmd_password} where u_id = #{uid}
update user set u_integral = #{getInteger} where u_id = #{uid}
mapper.select: select * from user where recsts ='1' and token = #{tokenVal}
select count(*) from user where u_phone = #{phone} and recsts = '1'
select id, value from integral where type = '1' limit 1
select u_id, u_integral, u_phone, u_nick, u_mmd_no, u_mmd_money, u_age, u_identity, u_address, u_headicon, u_qrcode, source, device_id, channel_id from user where u_phone = #{phone} and recsts != 'D'
update user set u_headicon = #{url} where u_id = #{uid}
select id, delivery_name, delivery_phone, delivery_address, province, city, districtn, street, zipcode from shipaddress where isdefault = '1' and recsts = '1' and uid = #{uid}
